LEARN ABOUT
EXPORTING

Learn about upcoming training opportunities,
review the Basic Guide to Exporting,
and connect with counselors who can answer your exporting questions.

READY TO
EXPORT

You have an established business and your product or service is selling well.
View information about potential markets and make your first international sale.

EXPAND
MY EXPORTS

Already exporting? Great! Grow your sales by expanding into new markets.
Register/Login to Export.gov to receive personalized information on your markets.

Welcome

Did you know that nearly 96 percent of consumers live outside the U.S. and two-thirds of the world's purchasing power is in foreign countries? Go where the customers are! There is significant opportunity for small businesses to profit through exporting.

CLIENTS

Whether new-to-export or experienced exporters, clients can find the information, access, and support they need.

read more +

LOCATIONS

Find local assistance and global contacts.

read more +

PEOPLE

Our people are dedicated trade professionals and diplomatic staff from the Federal Agencies that support U.S. exports.

read more +

PARTNERS

Our network extends to public and private partners as we work collectively to identify and offer international trade support specific to your business needs.

Readiness Assessment

Take our Export Readiness Assessment and get started with exporting. Through the assessment, we can help you explore training and counseling programs, develop an export business plan, conduct market research, find foreign buyers, and finance your exports.

New Markets

Export.gov brings together resources from across the U.S. Government to assist in the development and growth of American businesses in the international market.

We work in partnership with U.S. companies to develop an export plan, implement their international sales strategies, and succeed in today's global marketplace.
